TD3Algorithm module¶

class TD3Algorithm.TD3Algorithm(observation_space: int, action_space: int, configs: dict)¶

Bases: shiva.algorithms.Algorithm.Algorithm

update(agent, buffer, step_count, episodic=False)¶

NOTE If doing episodic updates only, step_count is the number of episodes actually!!!

calculate_actor_loss(states)¶

Calculates the loss for the actor

compute_critic_values_for_next_states(next_states)¶

Computes the critic values for next states to be used in the loss for the critic

compute_critic_values_for_current_states(rewards, critic_targets_next, dones)¶

Computes the critic values for current states to be used in the loss for the critic

take_optimisation_step(optimizer, network, loss, grad_clip_norm=None, retain_graph=False)¶

Takes an optimisation step by calculating gradients given the loss and then updating the parameters

soft_update_of_target_network(local_model, target_model, tau)¶

Updates the target network in the direction of the local network but by taking a step size less than one so the target network’s parameter values trail the local networks. This helps stabilise training

create_agent()¶

Creates a new agent

Input

Return

Agent

create_agent_of_role(role)¶
get_metrics(episodic, agent_id)¶
